We design of some of the most complex and specialized facilities being constructed today.<br> This challenging position involves working as part of a multi-discipline, highly interactive and coordinated team focused on projects including semiconductor manufacturing, data center facilities, and other state of the art manufacturing facilities.<\u002Fp> \n <p>The ideal candidate will be a self-motivated individual with excellent communication skills. They will exhibit a passion and desire to apply their professional experience and knowledge in a team environment on technically challenging and professionally rewarding projects.<\u002Fp> \n <p>Our Electrical Designers:<\u002Fp> \n <ul>\n  <li>Perform necessary engineering and design tasks to produce construction documents in conjunction with a team of engineers and designers<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Under the direction of a Senior Engineer, design electrical services packages in Revit &amp; AutoCAD<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Coordinate and collaborate real time with other disciplines to develop designs<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Follow quality and CAD\u002FBIM standards<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Provide technical support and assistance to Electrical Engineers<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Analyze and design complex building systems, including: \n   <ul>\n    <li>Medium and low voltage power systems<\u002Fli> \n    <li>Lighting, grounding, and process heating systems<\u002Fli> \n    <li>Standby generator and UPS systems for critical power needs<\u002Fli> \n   <\u002Ful><\u002Fli>\n  <li>Perform field activities such as filed surveys and design verification<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Provide guidance and mentoring to junior designers on a project-by-project basis<br> <\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <b>Here’s What You’ll Need:<\u002Fb>\n <br> \n <ul> \n  <li>Working knowledge of AutoCAD and Revit<\u002Fli> \n  <li>5+ years of formal experience in heavy industrial engineering design<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Experience in the complete suite of electrical engineering design services. This include (but is not limited to) MV and LV power distribution, generators, UPS systems, lighting &amp; emergency lighting, vertical transportation, small power, lightning protection, earthing &amp; bonding, and hazardous areas<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Knowledge of applicable electrical engineering codes, standards and acceptable industry practices<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Excellent English and German; written and spoken<\u002Fli> \n  <li>A strong ethical approach to safety, quality and environmental protection<\u002Fli> \n <\u002Ful>\n <p><b>Here's what we offer:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <ul>\n career development and work-life-balance<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Friendly atmosphere and professional cooperation based on diversity and inclusion in the workplace (e.g. various network organizations such Der Geschäftsbereich People &amp; Places Solutions steht für die Verbesserung unserer Lebensqualität rund um den Globus. Das Ziel, innovative Lösungen für unsere Umwelt und Gesellschaft zu entwickeln, treibt uns an.\n <br> Wir implementieren lebenswichtige Technologien, sorgen für sauberes Trinkwasser und stellen eine globale Vernetzung durch moderne Infrastruktur sowie neue Innovationen sicher. Unsere einzigartige, interdisziplinäre und ganzheitliche Herangehensweise macht es möglich, die Welt von Morgen nachhaltig zu prägen.\n <br> \n <br> Bewerben Sie sich bei Jacobs und setzen Sie Ihre Karriere in einem Unternehmen fort, dass Ihnen die Möglichkeit gibt sich zu entwickeln, Ihre Bestleistungen hervorzubringen und die Zukunft zu gestalten.\n <br> \n <b>Your Impact:<\u002Fb>\n <p><br> Jacobs is expanding its local engineering operations in Germany. The local team acts as main point of contact for our customers, subcontractors and partners, collaborates with subject matter experts in our United Kingdom and US offices, and our global delivery centers located in India and Poland. The local team drives to bring conceptual designs to life, producing cutting-edge detailed design of systems that are fully integrated.<\u002Fp> \n <p><b>Lead Process Engineer's<\u002Fb> key duties include:<\u002Fp> \n <ul>\n  <li>Lead the design team for process engineering for new construction in various locations across Germany, including directing contract design engineering activities and tracking hours and deliverables of reporting engineers (team of 15 or more engineers, across geographical, language and cultural borders).<\u002Fli>\n  <li>Provide input to the engineering team with regards to the local codes and standards, design scope changes, deliverables, timelines, and provide feedback on deliverables quality.<\u002Fli>\n  <li>Provide engineering support to operations to help resolve process bottlenecks and other long-standing issues. Successful candidate will also be expected to provide technical expertise to the engineering\u002Fdesign team and other groups within organization as a subject matter expect (SME)<\u002Fli>\n  <li>Leader in the front-end designs including deliverables such as scope development, conceptual design package, specification development, P&amp;IDs, equipment sizing calculations, sequence of operations and controls philosophy development<\u002Fli>\n  <li>Participate in on-site construction and commissioning activities by acting as the point of contact for technical questions and real-time issue resolution.<\u002Fli>\n  <li>Review process design work performed by the Process Team to ensure every design maintains the highest level of quality. Continually develop and improve upon project workflows and standards to ensure each design is consistently excellent.<\u002Fli>\n  <li>Participate in executive funding reviews and engineering concept reviews on behalf of the process\u002Fbuilding systems engineering team.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <b>Here’s What You’ll Need:<\u002Fb>\n <ul>\n  <li><br> Technical expertise in German engineering codes, regulations, (including fire protection standards), including level of detail required for permitting and construction<\u002Fli>\n  <li>Bachelor’s Degree in Process or Mechanical Engineering or relevant professional experience<\u002Fli>\n  <li>At least 5 years of experience in Process Design, within a high-tech industry such as automotive, semiconductor, specialty chemical, solar, battery, etc. A combination of experience with an owner\u002Foperator and an EPC firm is highly desired.<\u002Fli>\n  <li>Experienced with design and operation of systems such as industrial and process wastewater, reverse osmosis\u002FDI water, compressed air, dessicant air systems, ventilation\u002Fcooling systems, specialty gas, chemicals, and other similar systems (preferred)<\u002Fli>\n  <li>Possess working knowledge of AutoCAD, Revit MEP, Navisworks, Bluebeam, and Orca (or similar specification development software)<\u002Fli>\n  <li>Ability to communicate fluently in German and English, and interface at an executive level.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful> \n <p>We offer:<\u002Fp> \n <ul>\n  <li>Permanent position in a company that works on sustainable, future-oriented projects<\u002Fli>\n  <li>International working environment and a unique corporate culture with focus on individual career development and work-life-balance<\u002Fli>\n  <li>Friendly atmosphere and professional cooperation based on diversity and inclusion in the workplace (e.g. various network organizations such as Career Network, Women's Networks as well as different mental health programs)<\u002Fli>\n  <li>Personal and professional development opportunities<\u002Fli>\n  <li>Flexible working time and remote work options<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n Der Geschäftsbereich People &amp; Places Solutions steht für die Verbesserung unserer Lebensqualität rund um den Globus. Das Ziel, innovative Lösungen für unsere Umwelt und Gesellschaft zu entwickeln, treibt uns an.\n <br> Wir implementieren lebenswichtige Technologien, sorgen für sauberes Trinkwasser und stellen eine globale Vernetzung durch moderne Infrastruktur sowie neue Innovationen sicher. Unsere einzigartige, interdisziplinäre und ganzheitliche Herangehensweise macht es möglich, die Welt von Morgen nachhaltig zu prägen.\n <br> \n <br> Bewerben Sie sich bei Jacobs und setzen Sie Ihre Karriere in einem Unternehmen fort, dass Ihnen die Möglichkeit gibt sich zu entwickeln, Ihre Bestleistungen hervorzubringen und die Zukunft zu gestalten.\n <br> \n <b>Your Impact:<\u002Fb>\n <p><br> Jacobs freut sich, Ihnen mitteilen zu können, dass wir unser Team erweitern und Karrieremöglichkeiten in Sachsen-Anhalt haben! Jetzt können Sie uns vor Ort auf unserer spannenden Reise begleiten, um die Herausforderungen von heute zu meistern und die Zukunft neu zu erfinden!<br> Werden Sie Teil eines lebendigen, dynamischen Teams, das erstklassiges Design für branchenführende Kunden auf der ganzen Welt entwickelt. Wir entwerfen einige der komplexesten und spezialisiertesten Anlagen, die heute gebaut werden.<br> In dieser herausfordernden Position arbeiten Sie in einem multidisziplinären, hochgradig interaktiven und koordinierten Team, das sich auf Projekte wie Halbleiterfertigung, Rechenzentren und andere hochmoderne Fertigungsanlagen konzentriert.<\u002Fp> \n <p>Der ideale Kandidat ist eine selbstmotivierte Person mit ausgezeichneten Kommunikationsfähigkeiten. Sie bringen Leidenschaft und den Wunsch mit, ihre berufliche Erfahrung und ihr Wissen in einer Teamumgebung auf technisch anspruchsvolle und beruflich lohnende Projekte anzuwenden.<\u002Fp> \n <p><b>Here's what we need:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <ul>\n  <li>Durchführung der erforderlichen Konstruktions- und Designaufgaben zur Erstellung von Konstruktionsunterlagen in Zusammenarbeit mit einem Team von Ingenieuren und Designern<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Entwurf von Telekommunikationsverkabelungsinfrastrukturen auf der Grundlage von Entwurfskriterien des Kunden, nationalen und internationalen Vorschriften, TIA\u002FEIA-Branchenstandards und dem Telecom Distribution Methods Manual<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Gestaltung der folgenden Elemente und Systeme: \n   <ul>\n Der Geschäftsbereich People &amp; Places Solutions steht für die Verbesserung unserer Lebensqualität rund um den Globus. Unsere einzigartige, interdisziplinäre und ganzheitliche Herangehensweise macht es möglich, die Welt von Morgen nachhaltig zu prägen.\n <br> \n <br> Bewerben Sie sich bei Jacobs und setzen Sie Ihre Karriere in einem Unternehmen fort, dass Ihnen die Möglichkeit gibt sich zu entwickeln, Ihre Bestleistungen hervorzubringen und die Zukunft zu gestalten.\n <br> \n <b>Your Impact:<\u002Fb>\n <p><br> Unser Energie- und Stromversorgungsteam bietet eine Reihe von Dienstleistungen für unsere Kunden in den Bereichen Übertragung und Verteilung. Dazu gehören Arbeiten an Hochspannungsübertragungsanlagen, HGÜ-Verbindungen, Energiespeichersystemen und Windparkanschlüssen.<\u002Fp> \n <p>Wir suchen einen leitenden Ingenieur für Schutz- und Steuerungstechnik zur Verstärkung unseres vielseitigen Teams für elektrische Übertragung und Verteilung. Die Stelle erfordert Kenntnisse und Fähigkeiten im Bereich der Leittechnik mit nachweislicher Erfahrung in der Planung und Spezifikation (einschließlich der Berechnung von Einstellungen) von Geräten, die in elektrischen Netzen und im Zusammenspiel mit erneuerbaren Energien eingesetzt werden. Der ideale Kandidat verfügt über umfassende Erfahrung in der Arbeit mit Übertragungssystemen und hat wahrscheinlich einen Hintergrund in den Bereichen Beratung, Energieversorgung oder erneuerbare Energieerzeugung.<\u002Fp> \n <b>Here’s What You’ll Need:<\u002Fb>\n <br> \n <ul> \n  <li>Abgeschlossenes Studium der elektrischen Energietechnik oder gleichwertige Qualifikationen und in P&amp;C FEED oder Detailplanung von Hochspannungsanlagen (150kV und 380kV).<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Erfahrung in der Planung der Hochspannungsinfrastruktur über den gesamten Projektlebenszyklus hinweg, Der Geschäftsbereich People &amp; Places Solutions steht für die Verbesserung unserer Lebensqualität rund um den Globus. Das Ziel, innovative Lösungen für unsere Umwelt und Gesellschaft zu entwickeln, treibt uns an.\n <br> Wir implementieren lebenswichtige Technologien, sorgen für sauberes Trinkwasser und stellen eine globale Vernetzung durch moderne Infrastruktur sowie neue Innovationen sicher. Unsere einzigartige, interdisziplinäre und ganzheitliche Herangehensweise macht es möglich, die Welt von Morgen nachhaltig zu prägen.\n <br> \n <br> Bewerben Sie sich bei Jacobs und setzen Sie Ihre Karriere in einem Unternehmen fort, dass Ihnen die Möglichkeit gibt sich zu entwickeln, Ihre Bestleistungen hervorzubringen und die Zukunft zu gestalten.\n <br> \n <b>Your Impact:<\u002Fb>\n <p><br> Unser Energie- und Stromversorgungsteam bietet eine Reihe von Dienstleistungen für unsere Kunden im Bereich Übertragung und Verteilung. Dazu gehören Arbeiten an Übertragungssystemen, HGÜ-Verbindungen, Energiespeichersystemen und Windparkanschlüssen.<\u002Fp> \n <p>Sie werden für die folgenden Aufgaben verantwortlich sein, einschließlich, aber nicht beschränkt auf:<\u002Fp> \n <ul>\n  <li>Leitung der FEED- und Detailplanungsarbeiten für TSOs<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Gewährleistung einer angemessenen Qualitätssicherung und Lieferung von FEED, Detailplanung und Angeboten für das Umspannwerk bis 380 kV.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Sicherstellung angemessener Ressourcen und Schulung der Ressourcen für die Durchführung der FEED- und Detailplanungsarbeiten.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Überprüfung der HV-Anlagenaspekte verschiedener Projekte, einschließlich HV-Layouts, Erdungsdesign und -berichte, mechanische Verriegelung, Bedarf.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Nachgewiesene Fähigkeit zur Verwaltung von Ausschreibungspaketen als Ausschreibungsleiter und zur Bearbeitung von technischen Angeboten für Hochspannungsanlagen.<\u002Fli> \n Der Geschäftsbereich People &amp; Places Solutions steht für die Verbesserung unserer Lebensqualität rund um den Globus. Das Ziel, innovative Lösungen für unsere Umwelt und Gesellschaft zu entwickeln, treibt uns an.\n <br> Wir implementieren lebenswichtige Technologien, sorgen für sauberes Trinkwasser und stellen eine globale Vernetzung durch moderne Infrastruktur sowie neue Innovationen sicher. Unsere einzigartige, interdisziplinäre und ganzheitliche Herangehensweise macht es möglich, die Welt von Morgen nachhaltig zu prägen.\n <br> \n <br> Bewerben Sie sich bei Jacobs und setzen Sie Ihre Karriere in einem Unternehmen fort, dass Ihnen die Möglichkeit gibt sich zu entwickeln, Ihre Bestleistungen hervorzubringen und die Zukunft zu gestalten.\n <br> \n <b>Your Impact:<\u002Fb>\n <p><br> Wir suchen zum nächstmöglichen Zeitpunkt für unseren Projektstandort in Würzburg einen<\u002Fp> \n <p><b>Werkstudent Facility Management (m\u002Fw\u002Fd).<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p>Als Integrated Service Delivery Partner ist Jacobs maßgeblich involviert in die Planung und Umsetzung des SuedLink<br> Projektes.<br> Im Zuge dieses Infrastrukturprojektes wird das größte Erdstromkabel der Welt geplant, entworfen und<br> gebaut.<br> Die Gleichstromtrasse wird eine Wegstrecke von über 700 km umfassen und verbindet Offshore-Windanlagen im Norden und Solarparks im Süden von Deutschland.<br> Dies stellt einen Meilenstein in der deutschen Energiewende dar.<\u002Fp> \n <p>Unsere Projekte bieten Ihnen spannende Herausforderungen und außergewöhnliche Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten.<\u002Fp> \n <p><b>Here’s what we need:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <ul>\n  <li>Du unterstützt das Project Service\u002FFacility Management Team bei den täglichen Aufgaben. <p>Challenging Today. Reinventing Tomorrow.<\u002Fp> \n <p><i> We're invested in you and your success. Everything we do is more than just a project. It's our challenge as human beings, too. That's why we bring a thoughtful and collaborative approach to every one of our partnerships.<\u002Fi><\u002Fp> \n <p><i> At Jacobs, we challenge the status quo and redefine how to solve the world's greatest challenges, transforming big ideas into intelligent solutions for a more connected, sustainable world.<\u002Fi><\u002Fp> \n <p><i> Design your career with a company that inspires and empowers you to deliver your best work so you can evolve, grow and succeed – today and into tomorrow<\u002Fi><\u002Fp>\n <br> \n <div><\u002Fdiv> \n <b> Your Impact:<\u002Fb>\n <p><b><br> Mission Statement<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p>Jacobs is seeking a qualified Information Technology (IT) professional to support the USSOCOM SITEC II Enterprise Operations and Maintenance (EOM) contract. Your career at Jacobs enables USSOCOM to fulfill its mission to “Provide fully capable Special Operations Forces (SOF) to defend the United States and its interests and synchronize planning for global operations against terrorist networks.” As a member of our team, you will support the vice president of the Enterprise Operations Group (EOG) as we partner with SOF military and civilian members to provide world-class IT services and support that connects over 60,000 users around the world in the areas of software development\u002Fmaintenance, network services, security, end-user computing, and test and evaluation.<\u002Fp> \n <p><b>Job Description<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p>Web Applications Engineers are responsible for the operation, maintenance and development of the command’s web collaborative information environment and SharePoint collection sites. This position shall analyze requirements and design code, test, debug and document custom or framework-based front-end script and markup language.<\u002Fp> \n <p>Responsibilities include the design, development and implementation of capabilities within the web collaborative information environment and support the Command Knowledge Manager in translating business\u002Fuser requirements into system\u002Fsoftware requirements specifications and models and assist the Business Process Analyst and SharePoint Specialist on transferring plans into code based solutions. <\u002Fp>\n <p>Web Applications Engineers should have in-depth knowledge of Internet protocols and applications, in addition to a solid understanding of business strategy. Web Applications Engineers should be well versed in web technologies and digital tools, such as JavaScript, and Asynchronous Java Script and XML (AJAX), Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP), Hypertext Markup Language (HTML)\u002FDynamic HTML (DHTML), REST, and other relevant technologies. This role involves understanding all layers of the web application stack, including the front end (e.g., markup, Cascading Style Sheets (CSS), JavaScript), web services, databases, and other relevant technologies. Strong communication skills and the ability to work both individually and as part of a team are needed.<\u002Fp> \n <p><b>Typical duties include:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <ul>\n  <li>For each project, develop a work breakdown structure and schedule with milestones, which includes technical reviews and audits, quality assurance checks, and customer acceptance testing.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Perform software development work in a non‐production development environment. <\u002Fli>\n  <li>Provide consulting services and technical support for the creation and maintenance of a development and staging environment.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Develop software in HTML5, CSS, JavaScript (JS), JS-based frameworks to include jQuery, Node.js, Bootstrap, AngularJS, React, TypeScript, Knockout, Handlebars.js and object models to include JSON, CSOM and REST.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Test developed software to assure accuracy, integrity, interoperability and completeness.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Create and revise documentation that addresses what core functionality and\u002For provided capability in a particular version of delivered a software product.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Create and revise end-user documentation to include how-to guides, training guides, and frequently asked questions (FAQs). <\u002Fli>\n  <li>Assist the Government in the preparation of training materials to include delivering the user manual, demonstrating new product features, providing sample test data and preparing scripts to support training objectives.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Gathering business requirements and developing specifications for web-based applications <\u002Fli>\n  <li>Providing technical assistance to web administrators <\u002Fli>\n  <li>Integrating websites with back-end systems such as databases <\u002Fli>\n  <li>Writing test plans, executing test plans, and documenting test results<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Writing easy to read, maintainable, testable code in languages such as Java, C#, or JavaScript, as well as several other technologies. <\u002Fli>\n  <li>Keeping technology stacks fresh so they are maintainable and consistently provide good user experiences <\u002Fli>\n  <li>Working closely with other developers, designers, testers and project leads<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Enhancing and maintaining existing applications written in a variety of languages and frameworks <\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p>#ansdefense #MOIP #SITEC2 #ansoconus<\u002Fp> \n <p><\u002Fp>\n <b>Here’s What You’ll Need:<\u002Fb>\n <p><b><br> Qualifications<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b>Clearance Requirements<\u002Fb>: TS\u002FSCI<\u002Fp> \n <p><b>Education Requirements: <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li>Bachelor's Degree. Significant relevant experience will be considered in lieu of formal education.<\u002Fli> \n <\u002Ful>\n <p><b>Certification Requirements:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <ul>\n  <li>DoDD 8570 IAT Level II or higher<\u002Fli> \n <\u002Ful>\n <p><b>Experience Requirements: <\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li>4 years of recent web development experience.<\u002Fli> \n  <li><p>2 years experience working on JavaScript<\u002Fp> <\u002Fli>\n  <li><p>2 years of API development (Java, C#, or similar) to access a datastore <\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n  <li><p>Relational database and SQL experience would be a plus <\u002Fp><\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><b>Additional desired (Not Required) certifications, skills, experience, and\u002For knowledge:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <ul>\n  <li>SharePoint Certifications <\u002Fli>\n  <li>MCSE Productivity<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Microsoft Certified Expert<\u002Fli> \n  <li>MCSA Office 365<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Microsoft Certified Associate<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Knowledge Management Training or Certifications<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Military Training or Experience<\u002Fli> \n  <li>ITIL v3 Certification<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Project Management Certification<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Agile Project Management Certification<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Security + Certified or other IAT Level II Certification<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Knowledge of AD Architecture and Groups Management<\u002Fli> \n  <li>MCSD Web Apps<\u002Fli> \n <\u002Ful>\n <p><b>Essential Functions<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p><b>Work Environment<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <ul>\n  <li>Work will be performed inside a large facility. An inside environment may be a cubicle (considerations: close quarters, low to moderate noise, bright or dim lighting). <\u002Fli>\n  <li>Work assignments vary based on client requirements. <\u002Fli>\n  <li>Work may include travel with the military to participate in exercises in austere conditions<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Outside work may include various environmental conditions including hot, dusty, cold, icy and windy climates.<\u002Fli> \n <\u002Ful>\n <p>Physical Requirements<\u002Fp> \n <ul>\n  <li>Sitting at desk. Phone use and PC or laptop. Filing required. May require lifting and carrying boxes of supplies or files up to 25 lbs. Extended periods of sitting while on PC\u002Flaptop or phone.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>May require climbing, working at heights and in small confined spaces such as under raised floors, inside closets and server racks. Must be able to sit, stoop, kneel or crouch for long periods of time. Work in noisy areas with hotter and colder temperature than standard office environmental conditions. Lift and transport equipment up to 50 pounds. <\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><b>Equipment and Machines<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <ul>\n  <li>General office equipment, which includes: telephone, fax machine, copier, PC\u002Flaptop, and other miscellaneous office equipment. <\u002Fli>\n  <li>Servers, switches, routers and other computer equipment that supports the network environment.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Operating hand tools, power tools, ladders and test equipment.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>May require operating motor vehicles.<\u002Fli> \n <\u002Ful>\n <p>Attendance<\u002Fp> \n <ul>\n  <li>Regular attendance in accordance with established work schedule is mandatory. <\u002Fli>\n  <li>It is important to be able to work any shift\u002Fdesignated hours required. <\u002Fli>\n  <li>You may be asked to continue performance in support of a war, contingency, or exercise <\u002Fli>\n  <li>You may be asked to continue performance during inclement weather or other conditions when others are not permitted to work<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Position may require night and weekend work and could include travel with the military to participate in operations\u002Fexercises located in areas with field conditions<\u002Fli> \n <\u002Ful>\n <p><b>Travel<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <ul>\n  <li>Continental and Oversees travel may be required. It is important to maintain a current passport.<\u002Fli> \n <\u002Ful>\n <p><b>Other Essential Functions<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <ul>\n  <li>Employment is contingent upon obtaining all required certifications within the timeframe specified in a waiver by the government (if applicable) and maintaining required certifications through the duration of the contract. Failure to obtain\u002Fmaintain required certifications will result in disqualification for this position and could result in termination.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Candidate must exhibit a professional behavior that promotes teamwork, fosters cooperation, and enhances productivity in the workplace. Must be well organized with the ability to coordinate, prioritize and execute multiple tasks simultaneously in a high-pressure environment. Ability to communicate verbally and in writing to work effectively with a variety of government, military and contractor personnel at all levels.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Candidate must be able to interface effectively with individuals at all levels of the organization.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Grooming and dress usually business casual, but dependent on client’s standards. Must not pose a safety hazard to employees working in the same general area.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>The position for which you are applying for requires a US government security clearance. This is to advise you, that should you be extended an offer, if you possess a dual citizenship (i.e., citizen of the US and another country), to be granted a clearance you will be required to relinquish your citizenship in the foreign country.<\u002Fli> \n <\u002Ful>\n <p>#SITEC2 #MOIP #CJpost #ANSDefense #SITECII<\u002Fp> Jacobs is an Equal Opportunity\u002FAffirmative Action Employer.
